meta.name: description
meta.content: The Lakeland School System was established in 2013 as a new school district outside of Memphis, TN. Learn more about our mission to learn, grow and lead.

img.title: 4-27-20 Board of Education Special Called Meeting

img.alt: Exterior photo of Lakeland Middle Prep

img.title: 4-27-20 Board of Education Special Called Meeting
4-27-20 Board of Education Special Called Meeting

div.p: Our K-8 system is one of the highest-performing in the state, and we offer numerous opportunities for students to learn, grow, and lead in our schools and beyond. Lakeland School System is designated as an Exemplary School District by the Tennessee Department of Education thanks to the hard work of our caring and dedicated staff, faculty, and administration. We hope you find what you are looking for on our website, but feel free to e-mail admin@lakelandk12.org if you need any additional information or have questions.

article.class: clearfix post-4261 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-board category-sessions

h1.a: 4-27-20 Board of Education Special Called Meeting

div.p: The 4-27-20 Special Called Meeting for the Board of Education was conducted electronically. A video of the meeting is available in this post. Visitors may need to refresh the page to load the video. Supporting documents can be found here.

article.class: clearfix post-4224 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news

div.p: In keeping with Governor Bill Lee’s recommendation this afternoon that Tennessee schools be closed through the end of the school year, Lakeland School System will also remain closed through the end of our scheduled year. We remain grateful to our students, parents, teachers, and staff who continue to work hard to be sure we are as ready to return to school as possible in the 2020-21 school year. We will also continue to communicate with parents and students regarding end of year procedures and, if possible, the rescheduling of end of year events.

A majority of our students are regularly utilizing our remote learning resources, and our teachers and staff will continue to work hard to be sure those resources are available to students. Regardless of when we return to school, our educators are prepared to meet students wherever they are academically as we do every year.
We thank our Lakeland School System stakeholders for their support and flexibility during this unprecedented time.

p.em: Source: Statement Regarding Extension of Coronavirus-related Cancellations (PDF released 4-15-2020)

article.class: clearfix post-4229 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news

div.p: Please visit the Registration page to view newly posted information regarding course selection for students who will be in grades 6-8 for the 2020-21 school year.

article.class: clearfix post-4207 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-board category-sessions

div.p: The 4-13-20 Business Meeting for the Board of Education was conducted electronically. A video of the meeting is available in this post. Visitors may need to refresh the page to load the video. Supporting documents can be found here.

article.class: clearfix post-4195 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news

h1.a: Health Trust Committee – Special Called Meeting 4-9-20

div.p: View the video of the online meeting by visiting https://youtu.be/bL5gSVeOy8c

article.class: clearfix post-4175 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-board category-sessions

div.p: The 4-6-20 Work Session for the Board of Education will be conducted electronically. A video of the meeting is available in this post. Visitors may need to refresh the page to load the video. Supporting documents can be found here.

article.class: clearfix post-4157 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news

div.p: The LSS Remote Learning Hub is now online & available for students/parents to access optional learning activities during the coronavirus quarantine.

article.class: clearfix post-4091 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news

div.p: Please visit our Flu/Coronavirus Resources page for updates and information. Answers to Frequently Asked Questions added on 3-17-20.

article.class: clearfix post-4028 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news

div.p: Parents should visit the Registration Information page for details regarding Spring Registration. Flyers are available there for returning students, new students, kindergarten students, and students in shared residency situations. An FAQ section is also included.

article.class: clearfix post-3809 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-schools

div.p: Parents should visit the Registration Information page for details regarding Fall Registration. Flyers are available there for returning students, new students, kindergarten students, and shared residency.

div.div: Lakeland School System offers educational and employment opportunities without regard to race, color, creed, national origin, religion, sex, age, or disability and adheres to the provisions of the Family Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA).
